Frame.Nav: 85 square feet of cab glass provides a panoramic view. Foot-level glass gives excellent view to the moldboard.
The body has a sleek clean design with hydraulic hoses hidden inside frame, improving visibility.

Moldboards come in 12-14 foot widths and are made from high-carbon steel for long life. The moldboard's involute multi-radius design cuts, mixes and rolls material off the moldboard like a wave. Extensions can add 2 feet on each end of the moldboard.

Light package includes upper and lower cab-mounted floodlights, rear floodlights, headlights and worklights mounted above the moldboard. The graders are equipped with front and rear turn indicators and hazard indicators.
Front attachments include a scarifier with up to 11 teeth, a V plow and dozer blade.
Front tires lean up to 17.5 degrees left or right to prevent side drift when cutting a ditch.
Front and rear sunscreens are standard for optimum comfort.
5 position locking saddle allows the moldboard to tilt up to 90 degrees.
Flip-down side panels increase access to service points.
Heavy-duty circle and hydraulics give the moldboard tremendous versatility.
Hydraulic diagnostic test ports are easy to access.
Operator-activated differential lock or limited-slip axles keep wheels moving in muddy or slippery conditions.
Bolt-on removable left and right tie-down brackets aid in secure transport.
Large hydraulically driven cooling fan runs quietly and draws less horsepower for better fuel efficiency.
Heavy-duty breakaway mirrors enhance operator visibility.
Convenient steps ease access to powertrain.
Rear attachments include a ripper or ripper-scarifier combination other grader attachments include a wing for snow control.
Wide openings and steps on both side of the cab ease entry and exit.
Heavy-duty powertrain delivers the performance needed for tough conditions. For added versatility and extra power, the 865 model comes in a dual horsepower (DHP) version.
Sloping rear hood includes industry-exclusive tilt-up feature that provides easy access to the engine and daily service points, making Case graders best in class on an SAE maintainability index.
Unique A-frame design of the drawbar provides strength and stability to the circle and moldboard.
Ground-level fuel fill with locking cap saves time and improves efficiency.
The moldboard shifts up to 21 inches (533 mm) left and 27 inches (686 mm) right. The moldboard is designed to accommodate laser systems for precision grading.
Industry-standard, low-effort controls will suit any operator. Adjustable steering column and deluxe seat improve operator comfort and productivity.
Heavy-duty front and rear frame provides strength and performance for productivity and long machine life.
